articles.title: Police officer killed, another seriously wounded in hotel room shootout in Georgia
articles.description:
The shooting suspect also was shot by one of the officers and was undergoing medical treatment and expected to survive, Gwinnett County Police Chief J.D. McClure said during a news conference.

The post Police officer killed, another seriously wounded in hotel room shootout in Georgia appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Two police officers were shot during a hotel room incident in Georgia.
One officer was killed and another seriously wounded in the shootout.
The incident raises concerns about officer safety for Boston residents.

articles.title: Bruins dress as colonial Patriots ahead of Stadium Series game in Tampa
articles.description:
"It's good ties to our football team, you know what I mean? We're at the football stadium, so I thought it played out pretty well.”

The post Bruins dress as colonial Patriots ahead of Stadium Series game in Tampa appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bruins players donned colonial Patriot outfits before the Stadium Series game in Tampa.
The game is set for February 1, 2026, at the football stadium.
This event strengthens ties between Boston's hockey and football cultures for local fans.

articles.title: Mayor of Portland, Oregon, demands ICE leave the city after federal agents gas protesters
articles.description:
Witnesses said agents deployed tear gas, pepper balls and rubber bullets as thousands of marchers arrived at the South Waterfront facility on Saturday.

The post Mayor of Portland, Oregon, demands ICE leave the city after federal agents gas protesters appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Portland Mayor demands ICE withdrawal following federal agents' use of tear gas on protesters.
Thousands of marchers gathered at South Waterfront facility on Saturday, February 1, 2026.
Boston residents may see increased scrutiny on federal law enforcement practices in local protests.

articles.title: ‘Melania,’ panned by some film critics, opens with strong ticket sales for a documentary
articles.description:
It’s the best opening weekend for a documentary, outside of concert films, in 14 years.

The post ‘Melania,’ panned by some film critics, opens with strong ticket sales for a documentary appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Documentary 'Melania' achieves highest opening weekend for non-concert films in 14 years.
Boston theaters report strong ticket sales, boosting local cinema attendance.
Critics' mixed reviews may influence future documentary screenings in Boston.

articles.title: Johnson says no quick House vote to end partial shutdown and blames Democrats for their ICE demands
articles.description:
Johnson signaled he is relying on help from President Donald Trump to ensure passage.

The post Johnson says no quick House vote to end partial shutdown and blames Democrats for their ICE demands appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: House Speaker Johnson delays vote to end shutdown, blaming Democrats' demands on ICE.
Johnson seeks support from President Trump to pass legislation amid the impasse.
Boston residents may face prolonged government services disruption due to ongoing shutdown.
